answerText: Three Tall Women[10] Three Tall Women is a 1995 play by this author, who wrote Seascape.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 8 | 7 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: A dramatic monologue in this play features a woman saying "I'm a good girl. I know how to attract men. I'm tall; I'm striking; I know how to do it." [10] Name this play in which the title figures, A,B, and C, are revealed to be aspects of the same person.
